channel.title: circus mobile on Life At The Circus

item.title: Why Do I Do This to Myself?
item.description: I am just gonna come out and say it… ya know those cutesie little stick people families you see on the back of minivans these days? I want one. But, I struggle with this for many reasons. I am a tad embarrassed. Like maybe those little stick people families are too cutesie and my friends will laugh and roll their eyes when they see me pull into the parking lot.
